content: this octopus pattern is a fun beginner-friendly pattern that is great for using up that yarn stash these little octopuses make great little friends for kids of all ages they work up quickly and are fun to make **details** skill level easy size 3 in length crocheted in the round **materials** cotton yarn #3 light dk 3 25mm hook embroidery thread black white and pink scissors yarn needle poly-fil **follow me** http //crochetingcarrot com/ blog https //www instagram com/crochetingcarrot/ https //www facebook com/crochetingcarrot https //twitter com/crochetincarrot https //www tiktok com/@crochetingcarrot https //www pinterest com/crochetingcarrot/_created/
